productDataStructure.description: Standard data structure for agricultural products in Kheti Saath

template.category: string - one of: Machine, Tool, Chemical Fertilizer, Organic Alternative, Homemade Ingredient
template.name: string - product name
usageInstructions: array of strings - step by step instructions
can include as many steps as needed
will show first 3 on card, all in modal

specifications.key2: value2 - can include any relevant specs

template.videoUrl: string - YouTube embed URL or other video platform
additionalInfo: array of additional tips or information
displayed as bullet points in modal

exampleProducts.name: Digital pH Meter
exampleProducts.description: Precision instrument for measuring soil and water pH levels
usageInstructions: Clean the probe with distilled water before use
Calibrate using pH 4.0 and 7.0 buffer solutions
Insert probe into soil sample (add water if too dry)
Wait for reading to stabilize (30-60 seconds)
Record the pH value and location
Clean probe after use and store in storage solution
exampleProducts.safetyTips: Handle probe carefully to avoid breakage. Store in protective cap when not in use.

daily: Rinse probe with distilled water after each use
Store probe in proper storage solution
weekly: Check battery level and replace if needed
Clean meter body with soft, dry cloth
monthly: Check probe for any signs of damage

additionalInfo: Soil pH affects nutrient availability to plants
Digital meters are more accurate than test strips

exampleProducts.name: Liquid Seaweed Fertilizer
exampleProducts.description: Natural liquid fertilizer made from processed seaweed
usageInstructions: Apply during early morning or evening
Spray on leaves for foliar feeding
Can also be applied to soil around plants
Use every 2-3 weeks during growing season
exampleProducts.safetyTips: Store in cool, dark place. Avoid contact with eyes. Non-toxic but may have strong odor.

weekly: Check for any precipitate or separation
monthly: Check expiry date and product condition
Monitor plant response and adjust concentration

additionalInfo: Rich in micronutrients and growth hormones

adding_new_products: Add new items to the agricultureData array in KhetiSaath.jsx
Ensure all required fields are included
Test modal functionality with new data
customization_options: Categories can be modified in the categories array
Modal sections can be conditionally shown based on data availability
CSS classes can be customized for different product types
Search functionality automatically includes new fields
